page.title: 12RELIGION 04160531
page.content: Our D-block has 2 medium-sized villages - Howden & Hunwick - and 2 small villages - North Bitchburn & High Grange.Howden has 1 Methodist Church and 1 Church of England.The Church of England is called St.Marys and it has a cemetery across the road. Hunwick Methodist Church was built in 1875 and St. Pauls Church of England was built 1844..The Churches hold services and Sunday Schools and are also used to hold Chistenings and Weddings.Church Attendences are declining in this area and Churches are closing.One Church in both Howden and Hunwick have closed in the past ten years.Once upon a time all children went to Sunday School. Nowadays very few children go.In Hunwick the Methodist Sunday School is enjoying a revival.
